description: The Marmot Costal Tee SS is an UpCycle product now made only with recycled fabrics—like every tee in Marmot's line—thanks to their partnership with Thread International. In addition to creating more sustainable products and helping to reduce their environmental impact, this partnership has also created more jobs in Haiti, a mission they fully support.
name: Marmot Marmot Coastal Tee SS - Mens
